input_text:
Job Title: Warehouse Technician

Location: Phoenix, AZ

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Management, Manufacturing

Description:
Job Description

Job Description

Pentair has a job opportunity for you! 

Join us as a Warehouse Technician for our Phoenix, AZ.

You will pick & prepare orders for shipping and utilize requisitions and order sheets to pick a wide variety of items.

What is in it for you?

Starting pay at $18/hr.Eligibility for annual pay increases based on company & individual performance9 paid holidays each year, plus 2 additional floating holidays2 weeks of paid vacation to start (accrued weekly), and prorated based on hire dateMedical, Dental, and Vision InsuranceUp to 5% 401K match starting day one of employmentTuition reimbursement to support your education goals

More Details About The Opportunity

Packing incoming stock away, taking inventory and reporting shortages.Keeping records of incoming and outgoing shipments.Picking orders as requested by management, and ensuring correct shipping information is attached and moving completed orders to shipping area.Sealing and tagging containers, confirming accuracy of orders and signing pick tickets to confirm.Placing containers on pallets, and securing with stretch wrap, shrink wrap and strapping.Picking, placing, and Loading products by using Forklifts, Carts, and Pallet Jacks. Must have at least 1 year of prior forklift experience

Position Hours/Schedule

1st shift: 6am to 4:30pm, Monday through Thursday

Physical Requirements

Physical requirements are standing, walking, twisting at the waist, lifting, and lowering weights up to 50lbs. Steel toed shoes are required on the distribution floor.

Pentair is an equal opportunity Employer

Diversity And Inclusion

With our expanding global presence, cross-cultural insight and competence are essential for our ongoing success. We believe that a diverse workforce contributes different perspectives and creative ideas that enable us to continue to improve every day. Race, gender, ethnicity, country of origin, age, personal style, sexual orientation, physical ability, religion, life experiences and many more factors contribute to this diversity.

We take ongoing action to improve the diversity of our workforce by:

Ensuring leadership involvement and ownershipAttracting and retaining diverse talent at all levelsFostering a globally aware, inclusive cultureEnsuring our practices are fair and non-discriminatory

Experience Level (if available): Associate

output_json.title: Warehouse Technician

Keeping records of incoming and outgoing shipments
Picking orders as requested by management
Ensuring correct shipping information is attached
Moving completed orders to shipping area
Confirming accuracy of orders and signing pick tickets
Securing with stretch wrap, shrink wrap, and strapping
Picking, placing, and loading products using Forklifts, Carts, and Pallet Jacks

9 paid holidays each year, plus 2 additional floating holidays
2 weeks of paid vacation to start (accrued weekly), and prorated based on hire date
Up to 5% 401K match starting day one of employment
Tuition reimbursement to support your education goals
